{"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":245752,"originalJapaneseLine":"「で、でも、マエリータ隊さんは","translatedEnglishLine":"\"B-But, why did Maelita's squad come to the castle?\""},{"lineNumber":245753,"originalJapaneseLine":"　どうして城に来たんでしょう！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Why did they come to the castle?!\""},{"lineNumber":245754,"originalJapaneseLine":"「理由は色々と考えられましたが……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"There were various reasons considered, but...\""},{"lineNumber":245755,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今はおおよその見当がついています」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I now have a rough idea.\""},{"lineNumber":245756,"originalJapaneseLine":"「――魔王の誘拐」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"—The Demon King's kidnapping.\""},{"lineNumber":245757,"originalJapaneseLine":"「み、美樹ちゃんですか！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Miki-chan!?\""},{"lineNumber":245758,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ちっ、あいつら美樹ちゃんに","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Tch, if those guys lay a finger on Miki-chan,\""},{"lineNumber":245759,"originalJapaneseLine":"　指一本でも触れてたら殺してやる！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'll kill them!\""},{"lineNumber":245760,"originalJapaneseLine":"「むっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph!\""},{"lineNumber":245761,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うおっ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Uoah!\""},{"lineNumber":245762,"originalJapaneseLine":"「カオスマスターですか！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Is that the Chaos Master!?\""},{"lineNumber":245763,"originalJapaneseLine":"「死ねええええええ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Dieeeeeee!\""},{"lineNumber":245764,"originalJapaneseLine":"一瞬の出来事だった。","translatedEnglishLine":"It happened in an instant."},{"lineNumber":245765,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが誰よりも速く先に動き、","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance moved faster than anyone else first,"},{"lineNumber":245766,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスアタックを繰り出す。","translatedEnglishLine":"and unleashed his Lance Attack."},{"lineNumber":245767,"originalJapaneseLine":"それを事前に読んでいた王様が","translatedEnglishLine":"The king, having predicted this in advance,"},{"lineNumber":245768,"originalJapaneseLine":"マエリータ隊の中から唯一前に飛び出す。","translatedEnglishLine":"was the only one from Maelita's squad to leap forward."},{"lineNumber":245769,"originalJapaneseLine":"結果――","translatedEnglishLine":"As a result—"},{"lineNumber":245770,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスアタックと王様の突撃が重なり、","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance's attack and the king's charge overlapped,"},{"lineNumber":245771,"originalJapaneseLine":"廊下がビリビリと震えた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and the corridor trembled violently."},{"lineNumber":245772,"originalJapaneseLine":"「王様！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The king!?\""},{"lineNumber":245773,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ここは……引き受ける……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I will... take care of this...\""},{"lineNumber":245774,"originalJapaneseLine":"「急ぐ……の、である！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"We must hurry...\""},{"lineNumber":245775,"originalJapaneseLine":"「え、やだ、王様！　やだよ、王様！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No, your majesty! No, please don’t!\""},{"lineNumber":245776,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ニードル、お前のことは、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Needle, I have thought of you as my true daughter...\""},{"lineNumber":245777,"originalJapaneseLine":"　本当の娘のように思っていた……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"like my real daughter...\""},

{"lineNumber":245778,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":245779,"originalJapaneseLine":"「幸せになれ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Be happy...\""},{"lineNumber":245780,"originalJapaneseLine":"　素直に、な……で、ある」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Honestly... so be it.\""},{"lineNumber":245781,"originalJapaneseLine":"「邪魔だーーーーッ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"You're in my way——!\""},{"lineNumber":245782,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐうっ！　うぅぅううーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Guh! Uuuuuuuu!!\""},{"lineNumber":245783,"originalJapaneseLine":"「げえっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Geh!?\""},{"lineNumber":245784,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスの攻撃をその身に受けて尚、","translatedEnglishLine":"Even after taking Lance's attack onto his body,"},{"lineNumber":245785,"originalJapaneseLine":"王様の突進は止まらず、突撃を敢行する。","translatedEnglishLine":"the king's charge did not stop and he pressed on."},{"lineNumber":245786,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こ、ここ、は……行かせん、で、ある……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I-I won't let you... pass...!\""},{"lineNumber":245787,"originalJapaneseLine":"「王様！　王様ァァ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Your majesty! Your majesty!\""},{"lineNumber":245788,"originalJapaneseLine":"「行くぞ、ニードル！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Let's go, Needle!"},{"lineNumber":245789,"originalJapaneseLine":"　王様の気持ちを無駄にする気か！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Are you going to waste the king's feelings?!"},{"lineNumber":245790,"originalJapaneseLine":"マッスルがニードルの体を掴み走り出す。","translatedEnglishLine":"Muscle grabbed Needle's body and started running."},{"lineNumber":245791,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あ、こら、待てーー！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, wait—!\""},{"lineNumber":245792,"originalJapaneseLine":"　えーい、邪魔だ、このデカブツがーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Damn it, get out of the way, you big lug—!\""},{"lineNumber":245793,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ここは退かぬ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I won't step back here!"},{"lineNumber":245794,"originalJapaneseLine":"　退かぬ……の、である！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I will not... step back!\""},{"lineNumber":245795,"originalJapaneseLine":"（我は、一世代限りの突然変異体……","translatedEnglishLine":"(I am a one-generation-only mutant..."},{"lineNumber":245796,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それ故に子をなすことは出来ない……）","translatedEnglishLine":"Therefore, I cannot bear children...)"},{"lineNumber":245797,"originalJapaneseLine":"（だからこそ、かりそめの娘よ……）","translatedEnglishLine":"(That is precisely why, my temporary daughter...)"},{"lineNumber":245798,"originalJapaneseLine":"（お前だけは絶対に……）","translatedEnglishLine":"(You alone, absolutely...)"},{"lineNumber":245799,"originalJapaneseLine":"（……学者よ……後は任せたぞ……で、ある）","translatedEnglishLine":"(...Scholar... I entrust the rest to you...)\""},{"lineNumber":245800,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うがーーー！　邪魔だーーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ughhhh! You're in my way——!\""},{"lineNumber":245801,"originalJapaneseLine":"…………","translatedEnglishLine":"............"},{"lineNumber":245802,"originalJapaneseLine":"……","translatedEnglishLine":"..."},{"lineNumber":245803,"originalJapaneseLine":"マエリータ隊が飛行魔物兵の助けを借り、","translatedEnglishLine":"Maelita's squad, with the help of flying demon soldiers,"},{"lineNumber":245804,"originalJapaneseLine":"空を駆ける。","translatedEnglishLine":"raced through the sky."},{"lineNumber":245805,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{"lineNumber":245806,"originalJapaneseLine":"往路ではあれほどはしゃいでいたマッスルも、","translatedEnglishLine":"Muscle, who had been so excited on the way out,"},{"lineNumber":245807,"originalJapaneseLine":"さすがにそんな気分にはならないのか、","translatedEnglishLine":"didn't seem to be in that mood now,"},{"lineNumber":245808,"originalJapaneseLine":"ジッと押し黙ったまま美樹を抱えている。","translatedEnglishLine":"holding Miki silently and quietly."},{"lineNumber":245809,"originalJapaneseLine":"他の魔物達も同様に、","translatedEnglishLine":"The other demons too,"},{"lineNumber":245810,"originalJapaneseLine":"作戦は成功ながらその表情は暗い。","translatedEnglishLine":"though the operation succeeded, wore dark expressions."},{"lineNumber":245811,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐすっ……うう……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sniff... Ugh...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「で、でも、マエリータ隊さんは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "B-But, why did Maelita's squad come to the castle?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうして城に来たんでしょう！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Why did they come to the castle?!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「理由は色々と考えられましたが……
今はおおよその見当がついています」
「――魔王の誘拐」
「み、美樹ちゃんですか！？」
「ちっ、あいつら美樹ちゃんに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Tch, if those guys lay a finger on Miki-chan,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 指一本でも触れてたら殺してやる！」
「むっ！」
「うおっ！」
「カオスマスターですか！？」
「死ねええええええ！」
一瞬の出来事だった。
ランスが誰よりも速く先に動き、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance moved faster than anyone else first,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスアタックを繰り出す。
それを事前に読んでいた王様が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The king, having predicted this in advance,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マエリータ隊の中から唯一前に飛び出す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was the only one from Maelita's squad to leap forward.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 結果――
ランスアタックと王様の突撃が重なり、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance's attack and the king's charge overlapped,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 廊下がビリビリと震えた。
「ここは……引き受ける……」
「急ぐ……の、である！」
「え、やだ、王様！　やだよ、王様！」
「ニードル、お前のことは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Needle, I have thought of you as my true daughter..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本当の娘のように思っていた……」
「幸せになれ……
素直に、な……で、ある」
「邪魔だーーーーッ！」
「ぐうっ！　うぅぅううーー！」
「げえっ！？」
ランスの攻撃をその身に受けて尚、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even after taking Lance's attack onto his body,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 王様の突進は止まらず、突撃を敢行する。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the king's charge did not stop and he pressed on.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こ、ここ、は……行かせん、で、ある……！」
「王様！　王様ァァ！」
「行くぞ、ニードル！
王様の気持ちを無駄にする気か！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Are you going to waste the king's feelings?!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マッスルがニードルの体を掴み走り出す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Muscle grabbed Needle's body and started running.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、こら、待てーー！
えーい、邪魔だ、このデカブツがーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Damn it, get out of the way, you big lug—!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ここは退かぬ！
退かぬ……の、である！」
（我は、一世代限りの突然変異体……
それ故に子をなすことは出来ない……）
（だからこそ、かりそめの娘よ……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (That is precisely why, my temporary daughter...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （お前だけは絶対に……）
（……学者よ……後は任せたぞ……で、ある）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (...Scholar... I entrust the rest to you...)"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うがーーー！　邪魔だーーーー！」
マエリータ隊が飛行魔物兵の助けを借り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maelita's squad, with the help of flying demon soldiers,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 空を駆ける。
往路ではあれほどはしゃいでいたマッスルも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Muscle, who had been so excited on the way out,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さすがにそんな気分にはならないのか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: didn't seem to be in that mood now,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ジッと押し黙ったまま美樹を抱えている。
他の魔物達も同様に、
作戦は成功ながらその表情は暗い。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: though the operation succeeded, wore dark expressions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐすっ……うう……

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text:

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even after taking Lance's attack onto his body,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マッスルがニードルの体を掴み走り出す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Muscle grabbed Needle's body and started running.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、こら、待てーー！
えーい、邪魔だ、このデカブツがーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Damn it, get out of the way, you big lug—!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ここは退かぬ！
退かぬ……の、である！」
（我は、一世代限りの突然変異体……
それ故に子をなすことは出来ない……）

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (That is precisely why, my temporary daughter...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （お前だけは絶対に……）
（……学者よ……後は任せたぞ……で、ある）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (...Scholar... I entrust the rest to you...)"

マエリータ隊が飛行魔物兵の助けを借り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maelita's squad, with the help of flying demon soldiers,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 空を駆ける。
往路ではあれほどはしゃいでいたマッスルも、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Muscle, who had been so excited on the way out,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さすがにそんな気分にはならないのか、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: didn't seem to be in that mood now,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ジッと押し黙ったまま美樹を抱えている。
他の魔物達も同様に、
作戦は成功ながらその表情は暗い。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: though the operation succeeded, wore dark expressions.
